name: Obah
description:
-Indonesia -

Ated 31 tahun, warga negara Indonesia. Ated memiliki pola hidup yang buruk selama WFH dan Ated ingin merubah pola hidup menjadi sehat dengan cara berolahraga menaiki tangga. Mari bantu Ated menaiki tangga sebanyak mungkin!

-English-

Ated 31 years old, Indonesian citizen. Ated has a bad lifestyle during WFH and Ated wants to change his lifestyle to be healthy by exercising climbing stairs. Let's help Ated climb as many stairs as possible!

Game by  Gorilla Grip Team
Hafez "oxs" Alvanro - Game  Designer
The Great Novian Ilham XVI  Deos - Game Programmer
Wahyu Rafi "Nukleud" Adi Wicaksono - Game Artist
